mentalWellness.title: Mental Wellness
mentalWellness.description: Learn about understanding your feelings, developing healthy coping strategies, and supporting others. Nurture your mind for a balanced life.
mentalWellness.skillAreaUnderstandingEmotionsDescriptio: Learn to identify and understand your feelings and the feelings of others.
mentalWellness.skillAreaCopingStrategiesDescription: Discover healthy ways to manage stress, anxiety, and difficult emotions.
mentalWellness.skillAreaMindfulnessBasicsDescription: Practice techniques to stay present and calm your mind.
mentalWellness.skillAreaBuildingResilienceDescription: Develop skills to bounce back from challenges and adversity.
mentalWellness.skillAreaEmpathyAndSupportDescription: Learn how to support others and build strong, healthy relationships.

languageLab.title: Language Lab
languageLab.description: Embark on a journey to learn new languages! Interactive lessons, vocabulary building, and grammar practice for languages around the world.
languageLab.skillAreaExploreDescription: Choose a new language to learn or continue your progress.

worldHistoryReligions.title: World History & Global Religions
worldHistoryReligions.description: Uncover the past to understand the present. This class takes you on a journey through world history, exploring pivotal events, influential figures, and the rise and fall of civilizations. We'll also delve into the rich tapestry of global religions, examining their origins, core beliefs, cultural impacts, and role in shaping societies across time.
worldHistoryReligions.skillAreaAncientHistoryDescription: Explore early civilizations and their legacies.

globalGeography.title: Global Geography
globalGeography.description: Embark on an exploration of our planet. Global Geography goes beyond maps, teaching you about Earth's diverse landscapes, climates, and natural resources. Discover how human societies interact with their environment, the dynamics of population, urbanization, and the fascinating interplay between physical features and cultural development.
globalGeography.skillAreaPhysicalGeographyDescription: Study Earth's natural features and processes.
globalGeography.skillAreaHumanGeographyDescription: Examine human populations and their impact.

bodyLab.title: BodyLab: Healthy & Active Living
bodyLab.description: Ignite your potential and energize your life! BodyLab is your interactive guide to healthy and active living. Through engaging lessons, we'll explore the benefits of nutrition, physical fitness, and mental well-being. Get ready for activities and insights that will inspire you to make informed choices for a vibrant, balanced life.
bodyLab.skillAreaNutritionFundamentalsDescriptio: Learn about healthy eating and diets.

lifeEssentials.title: Life Essentials: Navigating Adulthood
lifeEssentials.description: Prepare for your future with confidence. Life Essentials: Navigating Adulthood is your comprehensive guide to the practical realities of independent living. This class covers vital topics such as personal finance (budgeting, banking, investments, loans), managing a household, understanding taxes and insurance, making informed decisions about mortgages and cars, and navigating the world of work and careers. Gain the knowledge and foresight you need to plan ahead and thrive.

languageLabView.noLessonLoaded: No lesson loaded. Please select a lesson.
